heading: Content of energy efficiency report
text:
Except as otherwise provided in section 28-308.7, the energy efficiency report shall
include, in a format prescribed by the department, (i) the energy audit report or documentation substantiating that an exception as set
forth in section 28-308.2 applies to such building, and (ii) the retro-commissioning report or documentation substantiating that an
exception as set forth in section 28-308.3 applies to such building.
